news.text: One paper has been accepted to IEEE ISMAR 2025!
I am glad to share that I have started a new position as an Assistant Professor in the Department of Computer Science at University of North Carolina Wilmington.
I have successfully defended my Ph.D. dissertation, Immersive Virtual Reality Simulation of Charged Particles: Design Guidelines and User Experience.
I have passed the dissertation proposal.
I have passed the preliminary examination.
I have joined Purdue University for a PhD!
Created a personal website. I will post updates here.
